timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.

timelineItems.name: Kamohelo Masibi
timelineItems.text: You can even feel the emotions #WorldCupFinal #GERvARG

timelineItems.comment: Lionel Messi (Argentina) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Mats Hummels (Germany).

timelineItems.name: Ashraf
timelineItems.text: Hummels slower than I expected. Struggling against Lavezzi and Messi so far. #GERvARG

timelineItems.name: Josh Lowder
timelineItems.text: #Messi so quick. Too bad no one could get on the end of the pass. #GERvARG

timelineItems.name: Casey Stoney
timelineItems.text: Am I the only one thinking Hummels is struggling??? How long before he gets exposed? #GERvARG

timelineItems.name: KayBisous
timelineItems.text: Bring on Klinsmann. #GERvARG

timelineItems.name: Katherine Lanpher
timelineItems.text: Soccer officially a USA thing. Folks are five deep outside the TGIF at Dallas airport, groaning and cheering #GERvARG

timelineItems.name: Josh Kocurek
timelineItems.text: Hey Argentina, stop trying to make rat tails happen. It's not gonna happen. #WorldCupFinal #GERvARG

timelineItems.name: Louis Bird
timelineItems.text: If Boateng isn't man of the match then I'll eat my hat! He's had a worldie! #GERvARG

timelineItems.name: Sam Mahlawe
timelineItems.text: For those who may have missed it; #ARG has never gone into extra time and lost. #WorldCupFinal #GERvARG

timelineItems.name: Simon Alexander
timelineItems.text: #GERvARG for me this game has been bossed by defenders and defined by some great tackling. Germany aren't fluent in attack

timelineItems.name: Evan Hiltz
timelineItems.text: 15 left. #GERvARG

timelineItems.comment: First Half Extra Time ends, Germany 0, Argentina 0.

timelineItems.name: David Farrar
timelineItems.text: In hindsight delaying my 10 am meeting is looking very wise! #GERvARG

timelineItems.name: Jordan Gaines
timelineItems.text: How good has Mascherano been!? Miss the guy at Liverpool. #GERvARG #WorldCupFinal #LFC

timelineItems.comment: Second Half Extra Time begins Germany 0, Argentina 0.
Foul by Toni Kroos (Germany).
Fernando Gago (Argentina) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Greg Jenner
timelineItems.text: If it goes to penalties both teams should form a suicide pact, like in The Hunger Games. FIFA will have to crown both as winners #GERvARG

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Javier Mascherano (Argentina).
Bastian Schweinsteiger (Germany) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Scherry
timelineItems.text: Weighed myself twice during this match. Thinking I'm the one running on the field. #GERvARG #FifaWorldCup

timelineItems.name: Jamie P
timelineItems.text: Extra time and penalties? Yeah no problem, not as if my alarm is set for 5am tomorrow. #GERvARG #WorldCupFinal #WorldCup2014

timelineItems.name: Natalie Dimovski
timelineItems.text: Can we have a World Cup every year? I'm not ready for this one to be over... #GERvARG #GER #WorldCupFinal

timelineItems.text: Morning commute in Sydney. Train platforms close to empty. Footballs great global power. #FifaWorldCup #FifaWorldCupfinal2014 #GERvARG

timelineItems.text: 0 - The last time #ARG failed to manage a shot on target in a #WorldCup game was the 1990 final. Repeat.

timelineItems.text: Super Mario Gotze will never score a better goal than that. Exactly how a final like this one should end. #GERvARG

timelineItems.comment: Match ends, Germany 1, Argentina 0.

timelineItems.name: OptaJoe
timelineItems.text: 1 - #GER are the first European team to win a World Cup in the Americas. Explorers.

timelineItems.name: OptaJoe
timelineItems.text: 67 - James Rodriguez scored a goal more regularly than any other player at the #WorldCup (180+ mins played); every 67 minutes. Spark.

timelineItems.name: OptaJoe
timelineItems.text: 17 - Asamoah Gyan and Cristiano Ronaldo attempted a shot every 17 minutes at the 2014 #WorldCup; more often than any other players. Eager.

timelineItems.name: OptaJoe
timelineItems.text: 2 - @matshummels had two shots (excluding blocked) during the 2014 #WorldCup and scored with both. Fierce.

timelineItems.name: OptaJoe
timelineItems.text: 3 - There were only three direct free-kicks scored at the 2014 #WorldCup, the fewest since 1986 (3). In 2010 there were five netted. Glitch.

timelineItems.name: OptaJoe
timelineItems.text: 22 - Miralem Pjanic created a chance every 22 mins 30 secs during the #WorldCup; more often than any other player (180+ mins played). Disco.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Gonzalo Higuaín (Argentina) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left.

timelineItems.name: George Scriban
timelineItems.text: Even hockey players are looking at that headshot and flinching #GERvARG

timelineItems.name: Rob Latford
timelineItems.text: My god. What a gift. #GERvARG

timelineItems.text: The only thing I'm hoping for right now is that Mueller and Messi dont score so James Rodriguez can win the golden boot. #KingJames #GERvARG

timelineItems.name: BRY.i.AN
timelineItems.text: Germany will be too strong in extra time. Muller to score. #gervarg #worldcupfinal :-):-)

timelineItems.comment: Dangerous play by Rodrigo Palacio (Argentina).
Bastian Schweinsteiger (Germany) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Greg Jenner
timelineItems.text: New idea. If after extra-time there is still no winner, 11 fans from each nation are picked from the crowd and play instead. #GERvARG

timelineItems.comment: Toni Kroos (Germany) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Fernando Gago (Argentina).

timelineItems.name: Kirsty Weakley
timelineItems.text: Needed an ice cream to cope with the tension #gervarg http://t.co/7jCPLFlfqD

timelineItems.name: Kirsty Weakley
timelineItems.text: Needed an ice cream to cope with the tension #gervarg http://t.co/7jCPLFlfqD

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Rodrigo Palacio (Argentina) right footed shot from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Marcos Rojo with a cross.

timelineItems.name: Catherine Kavanagh
timelineItems.text: I blame that stupid hair do #GERvARG #Palacio

timelineItems.name: Mitch Broadbent
timelineItems.text: I predict Argentina will win now because they will be able to win a ball in the midfield and score on the counter attack. #WorldCup #GERvARG

timelineItems.name: MissBwalya
timelineItems.text: What’s the story behind the rat tail? #GERvARG
